notes: The design is inspired by the Art Deco style, incorporating geometric patterns, bold lines, and luxurious materials.
Floor-to-ceiling windows are strategically placed following Vastu guidelines for maximizing light and positive energy.
Balconies have been integrated with each bedroom to ensure privacy and enhanced natural lighting while adhering to local building norms.
vastu_considerations: Main entrance is designed on the auspicious north or east side.
Living areas are oriented to maximize natural light and promote positive energy flow.
Bedrooms with balconies face either south or west to balance the Vastu elements.
